channel.title: Decompiling
channel.description: Someone mind showing/telling me how i can decompile my minecraft launcher i searched for jode decompiler and i couldnt found out on how to use it.

item.title: Decompiling
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I did forget to ask if your using the old version of launcher (that auto updated without asking) or the newer launcher (asks if you wish to update). Sorry it took so long lol. Went over to my girls house for a while.

Anyways, here is for the old version.
http://pastebin.com/GTJ5p1aP

EDIT - Reason I said the class was tricky to fix. Is because as you fix some errors, more will appear. Some pieces of code needing to be re-written and such (barely any at all though). Took me a bit of time to get it all sorted out myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

That class is a tad tricky to fix. Ill send you a fixed one after work.

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

I now have jad, i decompiled my launcher and i opened the loginForm.JAD and editied some stuff then i saved it as a .java
I then got an error which ill post. so i thought what i changed may have caused the error, So i downloaded a fresh launcher, decompiled then saved the loginForm as a .java and got the same errors these errors were;

LoginForm.java:284: ';' Expected illegal start of type Throws HeadlessException LoginForm.java:284: ';' Expected LoginForm.java:351: ';' Expected illegal start of type Throws HeadlessException

LoginForm.java:351: ‘;’ Expected
Throws HeadlessException


LoginForm.java

[code]// Decompiled by Jad v1.5.8g. Copyright 2001 Pavel Kouznetsov.
// Jad home page: http://www.kpdus.com/jad.html
// Decompiler options: packimports(3)
// Source File Name: LoginForm.java

package net.minecraft;

import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
import java.awt.image.VolatileImage;
import java.io.;
import java.net.URL;
import java.util.Random;
import javax.crypto.;
import javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec;
import javax.crypto.spec.PBEParameterSpec;
import javax.imageio.ImageIO;

// Referenced classes of package net.minecraft:
// Util, LauncherFrame

public class LoginForm extends Panel
{

public LoginForm(final LauncherFrame launcherFrame)
{
    userName = new TextField(20);
    password = new TextField(20);
    rememberBox = new Checkbox("Remember password");
    launchButton = new Button("Login");
    retryButton = new Button("Try again");
    offlineButton = new Button("Play offline");
    errorLabel = new Label("", 1);
    outdated = false;
    this.launcherFrame = launcherFrame;
    GridBagLayout gbl = new GridBagLayout();
    setLayout(gbl);
    add(buildLoginPanel());
    try
    {
        bgImage = ImageIO.read(net/minecraft/LoginForm.getResource("dirt.png")).getScaledInstance(32, 32, 16);
    }
    catch(IOException e)
    {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
    readUsername();
    retryButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
        {
            errorLabel.setText("");
            removeAll();
            add(buildLoginPanel());
            validate();
        }

        final LoginForm this$0;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super();
        }
    }

);
offlineButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
        {
            launcherFrame.playCached(userName.getText());
        }

        final LoginForm this$0;
        private final LauncherFrame val$launcherFrame;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            launcherFrame = launcherframe;
            super();
        }
    }

);
launchButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
        {
            launcherFrame.login(userName.getText(), password.getText());
        }

        final LoginForm this$0;
        private final LauncherFrame val$launcherFrame;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            launcherFrame = launcherframe;
            super();
        }
    }

);
}

private void readUsername()
{
    try
    {
        File lastLogin = new File(Util.getWorkingDirectory(), "lastlogin");
        Cipher cipher = getCipher(2, "passwordfile");
        DataInputStream dis;
        if(cipher != null)
            dis = new DataInputStream(new CipherInputStream(new FileInputStream(lastLogin), cipher));
        else
            dis = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream(lastLogin));
        userName.setText(dis.readUTF());
        password.setText(dis.readUTF());
        rememberBox.setState(password.getText().length() > 0);
        dis.close();
    }
    catch(Exception e)
    {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

private void writeUsername()
{
    try
    {
        File lastLogin = new File(Util.getWorkingDirectory(), "lastlogin");
        Cipher cipher = getCipher(1, "passwordfile");
        DataOutputStream dos;
        if(cipher != null)
            dos = new DataOutputStream(new CipherOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(lastLogin), cipher));
        else
            dos = new DataOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(lastLogin));
        dos.writeUTF(userName.getText());
        dos.writeUTF(rememberBox.getState() ? password.getText() : "");
        dos.close();
    }
    catch(Exception e)
    {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

private Cipher getCipher(int mode, String password)
    throws Exception
{
    Random random = new Random(0x29482c2L);
    byte salt[] = new byte[8];
    random.nextBytes(salt);
    PBEParameterSpec pbeParamSpec = new PBEParameterSpec(salt, 5);
    javax.crypto.SecretKey pbeKey = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("PBEWithMD5AndDES").generateSecret(new PBEKeySpec(password.toCharArray()));
    Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("PBEWithMD5AndDES");
    cipher.init(mode, pbeKey, pbeParamSpec);
    return cipher;
}

public void update(Graphics g)
{
    paint(g);
}

public void paint(Graphics g2)
{
    int w = getWidth() / 2;
    int h = getHeight() / 2;
    if(img == null || img.getWidth() != w || img.getHeight() != h)
        img = createVolatileImage(w, h);
    Graphics g = img.getGraphics();
    for(int x = 0; x <= w / 32; x++)
    {
        for(int y = 0; y <= h / 32; y++)
            g.drawImage(bgImage, x * 32, y * 32, null);

    }

    g.setColor(Color.LIGHT_GRAY);
    String msg = "Minecraft Launcher";
    g.setFont(new Font(null, 1, 20));
    FontMetrics fm = g.getFontMetrics();
    g.drawString(msg, w / 2 - fm.stringWidth(msg) / 2, h / 2 - fm.getHeight() * 2);
    g.dispose();
    g2.drawImage(img, 0, 0, w * 2, h * 2, null);
}

private Panel buildLoginPanel()
{
    Panel panel = new Panel() {

        public Insets getInsets()
        {
            return insets;
        }

        public void update(Graphics g)
        {
            paint(g);
        }

        public void paint(Graphics g)
        {
            super.paint(g);
            int hOffs = 0;
            g.setColor(Color.BLACK);
            g.drawRect(0, 0 + hOffs, getWidth() - 1, getHeight() - 1 - hOffs);
            g.drawRect(1, 1 + hOffs, getWidth() - 3, getHeight() - 3 - hOffs);
            g.setColor(Color.WHITE);
            g.drawRect(2, 2 + hOffs, getWidth() - 5, getHeight() - 5 - hOffs);
        }

        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
        private Insets insets;
        final LoginForm this$0;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super();
            insets = new Insets(12, 24, 16, 32);
        }
    }

;
panel.setBackground(Color.GRAY);
BorderLayout layout = new BorderLayout();
layout.setHgap(0);
layout.setVgap(8);
panel.setLayout(layout);
GridLayout gl1 = new GridLayout(0, 1);
GridLayout gl2 = new GridLayout(0, 1);
gl1.setVgap(2);
gl2.setVgap(2);
Panel titles = new Panel(gl1);
Panel values = new Panel(gl2);
titles.add(new Label(“Username:”, 2));
titles.add(new Label(“Password:”, 2));
titles.add(new Label("", 2));
password.setEchoChar(’*’);
values.add(userName);
values.add(password);
values.add(rememberBox);
panel.add(titles, “West”);
panel.add(values, “Center”);
Panel loginPanel = new Panel(new BorderLayout());
Panel registerPanel = new Panel(new BorderLayout());
try
{
if(outdated)
{
Label accountLink = new Label(“You need to update the launcher!”) {

                public void paint(Graphics g)
                {
                    super.paint(g);
                    int x = 0;
                    int y = 0;
                    FontMetrics fm = g.getFontMetrics();
                    int width = fm.stringWidth(getText());
                    int height = fm.getHeight();
                    if(getAlignment() == 0)
                        x = 0;
                    else
                    if(getAlignment() == 1)
                        x = getBounds().width / 2 - width / 2;
                    else
                    if(getAlignment() == 2)
                        x = getBounds().width - width;
                    y = (getBounds().height / 2 + height / 2) - 1;
                    g.drawLine(x + 2, y, (x + width) - 2, y);
                }

                public void update(Graphics g)
                {
                    paint(g);
                }

                private static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
                final LoginForm this$0;

        
            throws HeadlessException
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super($anonymous0);
        }
            }

;
accountLink.setCursor(Cursor.getPredefinedCursor(12));
accountLink.addMouseListener(new MouseAdapter() {

                public void mousePressed(MouseEvent arg0)
                {
                    try
                    {
                        Desktop.getDesktop().browse((new URL("http://www.minecraft.net/download.jsp")).toURI());
                    }
                    catch(Exception e)
                    {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }

                final LoginForm this$0;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super();
        }
            }

);
accountLink.setForeground(Color.BLUE);
registerPanel.add(accountLink, “West”);
registerPanel.add(new Panel(), “Center”);
} else
{
Label accountLink = new Label(“Need account?”) {

                public void paint(Graphics g)
                {
                    super.paint(g);
                    int x = 0;
                    int y = 0;
                    FontMetrics fm = g.getFontMetrics();
                    int width = fm.stringWidth(getText());
                    int height = fm.getHeight();
                    if(getAlignment() == 0)
                        x = 0;
                    else
                    if(getAlignment() == 1)
                        x = getBounds().width / 2 - width / 2;
                    else
                    if(getAlignment() == 2)
                        x = getBounds().width - width;
                    y = (getBounds().height / 2 + height / 2) - 1;
                    g.drawLine(x + 2, y, (x + width) - 2, y);
                }

                public void update(Graphics g)
                {
                    paint(g);
                }

                private static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
                final LoginForm this$0;

        
            throws HeadlessException
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super($anonymous0);
        }
            }

;
accountLink.setCursor(Cursor.getPredefinedCursor(12));
accountLink.addMouseListener(new MouseAdapter() {

                public void mousePressed(MouseEvent arg0)
                {
                    try
                    {
                        Desktop.getDesktop().browse((new URL("http://www.minecraft.net/register.jsp")).toURI());
                    }
                    catch(Exception e)
                    {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }

                final LoginForm this$0;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super();
        }
            }

);
accountLink.setForeground(Color.BLUE);
registerPanel.add(accountLink, “West”);
registerPanel.add(new Panel(), “Center”);
}
}
catch(Error error) { }
loginPanel.add(registerPanel, “Center”);
loginPanel.add(launchButton, “East”);
panel.add(loginPanel, “South”);
errorLabel.setFont(new Font(null, 2, 16));
errorLabel.setForeground(new Color(0x800000));
panel.add(errorLabel, “North”);
return panel;
}

private Panel buildOfflinePanel()
{
    Panel panel = new Panel() {

        public Insets getInsets()
        {
            return insets;
        }

        public void update(Graphics g)
        {
            paint(g);
        }

        public void paint(Graphics g)
        {
            super.paint(g);
            int hOffs = 0;
            g.setColor(Color.BLACK);
            g.drawRect(0, 0 + hOffs, getWidth() - 1, getHeight() - 1 - hOffs);
            g.drawRect(1, 1 + hOffs, getWidth() - 3, getHeight() - 3 - hOffs);
            g.setColor(Color.WHITE);
            g.drawRect(2, 2 + hOffs, getWidth() - 5, getHeight() - 5 - hOffs);
        }

        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
        private Insets insets;
        final LoginForm this$0;

        
        {
            this$0 = LoginForm.this;
            super();
            insets = new Insets(12, 24, 16, 32);
        }
    }

;
panel.setBackground(Color.GRAY);
BorderLayout layout = new BorderLayout();
panel.setLayout(layout);
Panel loginPanel = new Panel(new BorderLayout());
loginPanel.add(new Panel(), “Center”);
panel.add(new Panel(), “Center”);
loginPanel.add(retryButton, “East”);
loginPanel.add(offlineButton, “West”);
boolean canPlayOffline = launcherFrame.canPlayOffline(userName.getText());
offlineButton.setEnabled(canPlayOffline);
if(!canPlayOffline)
panel.add(new Label(“Play online once to enable offline”), “Center”);
panel.add(loginPanel, “South”);
errorLabel.setFont(new Font(null, 2, 16));
errorLabel.setForeground(new Color(0x800000));
panel.add(errorLabel, “North”);
return panel;
}

public void setError(String errorMessage)
{
    removeAll();
    add(buildLoginPanel());
    errorLabel.setText(errorMessage);
    validate();
}

public void loginOk()
{
    writeUsername();
}

public void setNoNetwork()
{
    removeAll();
    add(buildOfflinePanel());
    validate();
}

public void checkAutologin()
{
    if(password.getText().length() > 0)
        launcherFrame.login(userName.getText(), password.getText());
}

public void setOutdated()
{
    outdated = true;
}

private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
private Image bgImage;
private TextField userName;
private TextField password;
private Checkbox rememberBox;
private Button launchButton;
private Button retryButton;
private Button offlineButton;
private Label errorLabel;
private LauncherFrame launcherFrame;
private boolean outdated;
private VolatileImage img;

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

there’s an option in jad to change the output to java, like -s or something

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I use Jad. Its ran via command prompt. I just placed it is my system32 in windows abd use it like that. That way I only gotta type:

jad *.class

Then a good idea is to:
rename *.jad *.java

To return to the correct extension.

Read full topic
